document_data.name: Flying zombie
document_data.mainbody: '''Flying zombies''' were a unique creation of [[Ongraunnathan]], a [[Calishite]] mage.
document_data.Abilities: Unlike normal zombies, flying zombies were capable of magical flight.
document_data.History: [[Ongraunnathan]] created flying zombies from slaves he screened for magical talent. They were ultimately turned against him by a rival sorcerer between {{yearlink|1286}} and {{yearlink|1294}}; after slaying him, they were turned against [[Aralagath Tarsil]], another of his slaves who stole his spellbooks, but they were destroyed by mages after chasing him into a crowded market.
